ygData.subject: Changing Resolution
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello.- I ve just got the game and played this weekend but I have a problem with the resolution. I have a 3DBlaster Voodoo2 and the game recognizes it and
ygData.messageBody:
Hello.-

I've just got the game and played this weekend but I have a problem with the
resolution.

I have a 3DBlaster Voodoo2 and the game recognizes it and works fine at
640x480.
But when I go and click on the resolution option to change it the game hangs
up totally. I tried again and I waited, maybe the game was loading something
but nothing, all movement in the screen stops and the game hangs.

How can I change the resolution? I would like to achieve 800x600.

Thanks a lot.

Daryoon
Lvl 2 Bard
Erollisi Marr
